strategy_reasoning: Google Summer of Code (GSOC) is a major community event. Using the 'summer garden' and 'planting seeds' metaphor aligns perfectly with our brand identity of growth and nature. It transforms dry administrative updates (Readme/Email fixes) into an exciting invitation for students to join our ecosystem.
